description: With an extensive knowledge of botany, Verina is always solicitous, always smiling, and always wishing for every flower to be blessed with the miracle of life.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Với kiến thức sâu rộng về thực vật học, Verina luôn ân cần, luôn mỉm cười, và luôn mong muốn mọi bông hoa đều được ban phước với phép màu của sự sống.
descriptionLocalized.id: Dengan pengetahuan botani yang luas, Verina selalu perhatian, selalu tersenyum, dan selalu berharap agar setiap bunga diberkati dengan keajaiban kehidupan.
descriptionLocalized.th: ด้วยความรู้ด้านพฤกษศาสตร์อันกว้างขวาง เวริน่าจึงมักแสดงความห่วงใย มีรอยยิ้มอยู่เสมอ และปรารถนาให้ดอกไม้ทุกดอกได้รับพรแห่งชีวิต

quote: Plants talk in a silent and sincere language. I can translate their talk for you, if you want.

quoteLocalized.vi: Thực vật nói chuyện bằng ngôn ngữ im lặng và chân thành. Tôi có thể dịch lời nói của chúng cho bạn, nếu bạn muốn.
quoteLocalized.id: Tumbuhan berbicara dalam bahasa yang hening dan tulus. Aku bisa menerjemahkan ucapan mereka untukmu, jika kau mau.
quoteLocalized.th: พืชพูดด้วยภาษาที่เงียบและจริงใจ ฉันสามารถแปลการพูดของพวกเขาให้คุณได้ ถ้าคุณต้องการ

resonanceChain.name: Moment of Emergence
resonanceChain.description: Outro Skill **Blossom** grants the next character a continuous Healing effect, recovering HP by {1} of Verina's ATK every {0}s for {2}s.

resonanceChain.name: Sprouting Reflections
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill **Botany Experiment** additionally grants {0} [Photosynthetic Energy] and {1} Concerto Energy.

resonanceChain.name: The Choice to Flourish
resonanceChain.description: Healing of Resonance Liberation's **Photosynthesis Mark** is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Blossoming Embrace
resonanceChain.description: Heavy Attack **Starflower Blooms**, Mid-Air Attack **Starflower Blooms**, Resonance Liberation **Arboreal Flourish** and Outro Skill **Blossom** increases the Spectro DMG Bonus of all team members by {0} for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Miraculous Blooms
resonanceChain.description: When Verina heals a team member with HP less than {0}, her Healing is increased by {1}.

resonanceChain.name: Joyous Harvest
resonanceChain.description: Heavy Attack **Starflower Blooms** and Mid-Air Attack **Starflower Blooms** deal {0} more damage. They will trigger Coordinated Attack {1} time and heal all characters nearby. The DMG of this Coordinated Attack and the Healing are equal to those of the Resonance Liberation's **Photosynthesis Mark**.

skills.name: Cultivation
skills.description:
**Basic Attack**
Verina performs up to 5 consecutive attacks with vines, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack**
Verina consumes STA to charge forward, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack**
Verina consumes STA to perform up to 3 consecutive attacks in mid-air, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Heavy Attack**
Hold **Basic Attack** to consume STA and perform a mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Spectro DMG**.
 
**Dodge Counter**
Use **Basic Attack** after a successful **Dodge** to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG**.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Basic Attack Verina thực hiện tối đa 5 đòn tấn công liên tiếp bằng dây leo, gây sát thương Spectro DMG. Heavy Attack Verina tiêu hao STA để tiến về phía trước, gây sát thương Spectro DMG. Mid-air Attack Verina tiêu hao STA để thực hiện tối đa 3 đòn tấn công liên tiếp giữa không trung, gây sát thương Spectro DMG. Mid-air Heavy Attack Nhấn giữ Basic Attack để tiêu hao STA và thực hiện đòn tấn công lao xuống giữa không trung, gây sát thương Spectro DMG. Dodge Counter Sử dụng Basic Attack sau khi thành công né tránh để tấn công mục tiêu, gây sát thương Spectro DMG.

skills.name: Botany Experiment
skills.description: Verina converges an energy field in front to grow foliage, dealing Spectro DMG** within the range.

skills.name: Arboreal Flourish
skills.description:
Verina nourishes nearby foliage at rapid speed, dealing Spectro DMG** while healing all Characters on teams nearby. A **Photosynthesis Mark** is applied to the target on hit.
 
**Photosynthesis Mark**
Whenever a Character on a team nearby performs an attack on targets with a Photosynthesis Mark, Verina performs a Coordinated Attack, dealing Spectro DMG** while healing the active Character dealing damage on a team nearby, triggered 1 time per second.

skills.name: Grace of Life
skills.description: Verina protects a team member from fatal damage and grants a shield with strength equal to 120%** of Verina's ATK, lasting for 10**s. This can be triggered 1 time every 10** minutes.

skills.name: Gift of Nature
skills.description: When Verina casts Heavy Attack **Starflower Blooms**, Mid-air Attack **Starflower Blooms**, Resonance Liberation **Arboreal Flourish** or Outro Skill **Blossom**, all team members' ATK are increased by 20%** for 20**s.

skills.name: Verdant Growth
skills.description: Verina attacks the target, dealing Spectro DMG**.

skills.name: Starflower Blooms
Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

skills.name: Blossom
skills.description: Verina heals the next character by 19%** of her ATK per second for 6**s. All characters on nearby teams gain 15%** All-Type DMG Deepen for 30**s.
